code:
flowchart TD
    subgraph Input[Education_ContentCDN]
        CLI[Education_ContentCDN]
        ConfigL[Education_LMS_Portal]
        ConfigP[Education_StudentDB]
        ImageL[Education_GradeSync]
    end
    
    subgraph Detection[Education_ClassroomService]
        CircleD[Education_StudentDB]
        ConvexD[Education_ContentCDN]
        ColorPal[Education_StudentDB]
        ColorSep[Education_LMS_Portal]
        HistC[Education_LMS_Portal]
    end
    
    subgraph Color[Education_ContentCDN]
        ColorExt[Education_LMS_Portal]
        ColorClust[Education_GradeSync]
        BlackV[Education_LMS_Portal]
        CMYKAcc[Education_ClassroomService]
        Calib[Education_GradeSync]
        FitM[Education_StudentDB]
    end
    
    subgraph Cluster[Education_ContentCDN]
        ClusterPC[Education_GradeSync]
        SlidingW[Education_LMS_Portal]
    end
    
    subgraph GPU[Education_ClassroomService]
        GPUCore[Education_StudentDB]
        GPURend[Education_ContentCDN]
    end
    
    subgraph Render[Education_LMS_Portal]
        CircleR[Education_StudentDB]
        ClusterR[Education_LMS_Portal]
        BlockR[Education_ClassroomService]
        TreemapR[Education_LMS_Portal]
    end
    
    subgraph Output[Education_ContentCDN]
        Formatter[Education_GradeSync]
        ImageExt[Education_GradeSync]
        Manifest[Education_ContentCDN]
        RunMgr[Education_ContentCDN]
        Runs[Education_LMS_Portal]
    end
    
    CLI --> ConfigL & ImageL
    ConfigL --> ConfigP
    ImageL -->|BGR| Detection
    
    CircleD -->|Standard Mode| ColorExt
    ConvexD -->|CMYK Mode| ClusterPC
    ColorSep --> ConvexD
    HistC --> ColorPal
    
    ColorExt --> ColorClust
    BlackV --> ConvexD
    CMYKAcc --> Render
    
    ClusterPC -->|ClusterResult| Render
    SlidingW -->|Per-Tile| ClusterPC
    
    GPUCore --> GPURend
    GPURend --> CircleR
    ClusterPC --> GPUCore
    
    CircleR & ClusterR & BlockR & TreemapR --> ImageExt
    
    Formatter --> Output
    ImageExt --> RunMgr
    Manifest --> RunMgr
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
